nodes.text: A shock buzzer was a device that produced an electric shock and was available during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The Jedi Padawan Kira Carsen once contemplated putting a shock buzzer in the chair of Grand Master Satele Shan as a practical joke.

Shock buzzers were mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a BioWare-LucasArts video game released in 2011, during the conversation "Paying a Compliment" with the Jedi Knight class's companion character Kira Carsen.
